reviews.review: Muito bom, supera o episodio anterior.
I'm going to go buy and play the 3rd one right now! can't wait to see how it ends.

The graphics were great and It ran smooth on my shitty laptop. Great lore however the final stryder defense thing was unbearable because admitedly i suck at fps so yeaa. Only complaint though and its my gameplay not the game itself
Truly, the Magnusson's mind is akin to a force of nature.
We, the fans. Will never forgive Valve for leaving the story unfinished.

[h1]Pretty good[/h1]
I liked this. While I didn't care about Episode 1, this introduces new stuff and exciting level design. The pacing is also a lot better than Episode 1. Again the same problems with the original game persist but it doesn't really create any new ones.

I really liked the vehicle session, probably because they felt more open-ended and challenging in their own way.

So I'd recommend this one, of course only if you liked the previous games, because otherwise, you won't be able to follow the story.
[h3]Rating[/h3]
8,5/10

Estos episodios han sido muy buenos y queremos que sigan sacando mas episodios o que mejor ¬°CONTINUEN LA HISTORIA CON HALF LIFE 3! estos juegos han sido la PVTA OZTI4 y geniales y vale la pena jugar toda la franquicia de half life.

My personal favourite in the series.
Amazing game. Can't wait to see where it goes next!!
Valve listen bud. You can't just leave the game on a cliffhanger like that and not conclude it. Make Half-Life 3, for me. I love you

Truly a masterpiece. Going for perfect game at first time playthrough is Pain...It is pain with a big P. definitely doable and worth it though, as i was truly able to appreciate the story and the difficulty in executing combat and takedown strategies and all this WHILE 100% achievements was absolutely possible to achieve first time playing through this following the storyline through the previous games ofcourse.

I did not receive any additional compensation/nor will i receive any additional compensation for writing my review on this game.

Just like Half Life 2, and Half Life 2 episode 1, this game is a super fun experience. This game is great, but I fell that if you have bought Half Life 2, you will have already bought this game, so there isn't much to say.
awesome game + you get gmod textures
